data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "In some ways, the internet has improved our lives. However, it has also created new problems. What are some of the ways that the internet has made our lives worse?"
data.answer: The development of the internet has provided great convenience to our modern livelihood. However, it has some distinct drawbacks that are difficult to be eliminated. The internet triggers the addiction. People can access information from all over the world without leaving their homes, so people are so addicted to and rely on this source of information. The internet cannot guarantee perfect information safety. The information may leak during the process of inputting personal information to get access online. There exist messy sources on the internet, and it is hard to determine which source is reliable. People cannot filter which one is real and which one is fake. The so-called “reliability” entirely depends on popularity instead of correctness.
